Spain: Alfonso the Brave invaded the taifa of Badajoz.
Battle of Llantada: Sancho the Strong defeated Alfonso the Brave at Llantadilla, in the taifa of Badajoz near modern Melgar de Fernamental.
Russia: Iziaslav was overthrown in a popular uprising and forced to flee to Poland.
Japan: The dominance of Fujiwara clan ends with the ascension of Emperor Go-Sanjō to the throne
China: The dry dock was first used in China.
